Data_Access.DAO

Class AbstractDAO<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Data_Access.DAO.AbstractDAO<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - reference to a table in the database
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CustomerDAO, OrderDAO, ProductDAO, StockDAO

    public class AbstractDAO<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides basic CRUD functionality for the given table
